name: Spread'n'Dread
description:
Spread'n'Dread

The theme of the game jam was "It's spreading".

In this game you yourself become master of death and have to transfer a deadly illness from victim to victim, until you eventually get to the target. More people will show up whenever you scare them out of their houses. Sometimes, the rapid spread of the illness takes its toll and kills the host. Be ready, before you run out of humans!

The game is incomplete and marked as a prototype. Thus, objects and assets are reused.
